sentences.en: " Hoist the recruiting flag and hungry men will come.
sentences.cn: “ 插起招军旗,就有吃粮人. ”

sentences.en: By using a hoist the movers were able to sling the piano to the third floor.
sentences.cn: 搬运工人用吊车才把钢琴吊到3楼.

sentences.en: Concret was raised by a hoist.
Give me a hoist ( up ), eg when climbing a wall.
sentences.cn: 往上推我一下 ( 如爬墙时 ).

sentences.en: Give me a hoist onto your shoulders.
He gave me a hoist up the tree.
Hoist the flag to the top of the pole.
It was indeed a clever plan to entrap his opponent, but in the end he was hoist by his own petard.
sentences.cn: 设圈套陷害他的对手固然是个妙计, 可是到头来却是作法自毙.

sentences.en: Materials are elevated to the top floor by the new hoist.
sentences.cn: 材料由那台新起重机吊到楼顶.

sentences.en: Most plants are provided with hoist wells for handling parts.
sentences.cn: 大多数工厂设有搬运零件的起吊孔.

sentences.en: The crew hurried to hoist the flag.
sentences.cn: 船员们急忙把旗子升起来。

sentences.en: The lifting capacity of this chain hoist ( hydraulic jack, screw jack ) is 5 tons.
sentences.cn: 这个吊链 ( 油压千斤顶 、 螺旋千斤顶 ) 的起重能力为5吨.

sentences.en: The seamen draw in their oars and hoist their sails.
The students were hoist by their own petards, however, as Granada decided to transmit the programme anyway.
sentences.cn: 不过，学生们聪明反被聪明误，格拉纳达最终还是决定要转播这个节目。

sentences.en: They hoist cargo with a crane.
sentences.cn: 他们用起重机吊起货物.

sentences.en: This mast held an iron stay upon which to hoist a jib - sail.
sentences.cn: 这条桅杆下面由几条铁索结结实实地绑着,上面有条铁支柱,用来支撑这面巨大的布帆.

sentences.en: We gave Gregory a hoist to the top of the fence.
sentences.cn: 我们把格雷高里举到篱笆顶上.

phrases.tran_cn: 电动起重机；电葫芦；电动卷扬机
升起（舰队司令）旗帜，（舰队司令）开始行使指挥权
升旗（表示拥有所发现的领土）

trans.tran_cn: 起重机，升降机，升起，<俚>推，托，举
trans.tran_en: a piece of equipment used for lifting heavy objects with ropes
to raise, lift, or pull something up, especially using ropes
to raise, lift, or pull something up, especially using ropes
